items.title: E-commerce Storefront
items.description: Browse products, manage shopping cart, complete checkout with payment processing.

items.title: Task Manager Dashboard
items.description: Create projects, assign tasks, track progress with kanban boards and analytics.

items.title: Restaurant Booking Platform
items.description: Browse menus, make reservations, leave reviews, and manage dietary preferences.

items.title: Travel Agency Website
items.description: Search destinations, book flights and hotels, manage itineraries, and handle payments.

items.title: Blog & Content Platform
items.description: Create posts, manage categories, comment system, user profiles, and content search.

items.title: Online Education Portal
items.description: Browse courses, enroll students, track progress, submit assignments, and view grades.

items.title: Creative Portfolio
items.description: Showcase projects, manage galleries, contact form, and client testimonials.

items.title: CRM Dashboard
items.description: Manage contacts, track deals pipeline, schedule activities, and generate reports.
